TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit PersonalizationStateInfo extends System.Object

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, implements a representation of information about a set of Web Parts data for a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Classes that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo> represent information about either a set of shared state data for a page or a set of per-user personalization state data for the page and a user. This class is intended for use in queries and management methods where the serialized Web Parts data is not necessary.

block.para: When you inherit from , there are no abstract members that you must override. Note that the class is abstract but none of the class members are abstract. This class is currently used internally by the .NET Framework and the constructor for this class is internal, so derived versions of this class have no way to initialize the , and parameters required for the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LastUpdatedDate As DateTime
public: property DateTime LastUpdatedDate { DateTime get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the date and time that the personalization state was last updated.
Docs.value: A indicating when the personalization state was last updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property provides the date and time that the shared or per-user personalization state information was last updated.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Path As String
public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets the path to the page associated with the personalization state information.
Docs.value: The path of the page associated with the personalization state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The path is an application-relative path, such as ~/application/page/page.aspx.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Size As Integer
public: property int Size { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets the size of the personalization state information stored in the underlying data store.
Docs.value: The size, in bytes, of the personalization state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For shared state information, size represents the size of the shared state in the data store. For per-user information, size represents the size of the per-user state for a specific user and page combination (determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo.Path%2A> property) as stored in the data store.
